ygData.subject: Re: BlackStorm or Nightlight?/Investigating the Caveman
ygData.msgSnippet: Seeing the shadows approach him, Denzabar began to panic. He stood up, backed against a wall, held up his hammer in defense and grunted a war call.

Seeing the shadows approach him, Denzabar began to panic. He stood up, backed 
against a wall, held up his hammer in defense and grunted a war call.

--part1_133.257ed6aa.2ca37f8d_boundary
